name: One Clicker
description:
A simple clicker/factory game where you combine numbers.

Note: when collecting a coin, the square of the coin's value is added to your balance.

Source code: https://github.com/Red-Teapot/CombinerClicker.

Controls:
  • Left click to spawn a coin or to build a machine.
  • LMB + drag to pan the camera, scroll to zoom in/out.
  • Right click to destroy a machine.
